app.name: JSDoc Baseline
app.one_liner: An experimental, extensible template for JSDoc that enables customizable and modern documentation generation.

screens.name: Documentation Output
screens.purpose: Displays generated API documentation with expandable table of contents and page summaries.

rust_commands.name: generate_docs
rust_commands.purpose: Runs JSDoc with the Baseline template to produce documentation output.

mvp_plan: week 1: Set up Baseline template as dev dependency
acceptance_tests: User can customize headings and appearance via configuration without modifying the template itself.
User can install Baseline as a dev dependency and generate docs using default settings.
